question: Which state has recently launched a virtual police station under its flagship 5-T initiative?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Odisha, Naveen Patnaik recently launched a Virtual Police station under the stateâ€™s flagship 5-T initiative.
The Chief Minister also launched two other innovative projects of the Odisha Police called Road Accident case documents module and Medico Legal opinion system. The Virtual Police Station will enable the citizens directly lodge FIR online without having to visit the police stations. The other two applications will help in downloading the required documents and online medical examination reports of accident victims.
